NAME: densely populated areas
Include: Cities (densely populated areas) — where at least 50 % of the population lives in one or more urban centres.

NAME: towns and semi-dense areas
Include: Towns and suburbs (intermediate density areas) — where less than 50 % of the population lives in an urban centre, but at least 50 % of the population lives in an urban cluster.

NAME: iintermediate density areas
Include: Towns and suburbs (intermediate density areas) — where less than 50 % of the population lives in an urban centre, but at least 50 % of the population lives in an urban cluster.

NAME: thinly populated areas
Include: Rural areas (thinly populated areas) — where more than 50 % of the population lives in rural grid cells.
